function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Optimal arrangement of chairs and tables may not allow for sufficient social distance","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and non-compliance with health regulations","Mitigation":"Conduct a thorough spatial analysis to ensure social distancing requirements are met, and consider using technology for automated seating arrangements","Technologies":"Spatial analysis software for layout planning, and automated seating management systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, architects, and building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate airflow circulation in the closed environment","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission due to stagnant air and poor ventilation","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation systems, consider air purifiers, and optimize airflow patterns using computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, computational fluid dynamics (CFD) software","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, HVAC specialists"}]}
